price: 39. Voilà ce que ton Seigneur t’a révélé comme sagesse. Ne prends pas avec Allah une autre divinité, ou alors tu seras jeté dans la Géhenne, blâmé et banni.
arabic: ذَٰلِكَ مِمَّآ أَوۡحَىٰٓ إِلَيۡكَ رَبُّكَ مِنَ ٱلۡحِكۡمَةِۗ وَلَا تَجۡعَلۡ مَعَ ٱللَّهِ إِلَٰهًا ءَاخَرَ فَتُلۡقَىٰ فِي جَهَنَّمَ مَلُومٗا مَّدۡحُورًا

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: dhālika mimmā awḥā ilayka rabbuka mina al-ḥik'mati walā tajʿal maʿa al-lahi ilāhan ākhara fatul'qā fī jahannama malūman madḥūran
